content:
Here's the verification flow implementation:

1. /status Command:
- User sends /status
- Bot checks if wallet is connected
- If not connected, prompts for /connect first
- If connected, shows:
  • Connected wallet address
  • Current USDC balance
  • Subscription status (active/inactive)
  • Last profit distribution (if any)

2. Data Storage:
- Store user data in simple JSON:
  • Telegram ID
  • Wallet address
  • Subscription date
  • Last distribution

Shall we implement this basic verification flow first?
